title: Verizon’s Visible expands eSIM support on Android to Google Pixel and Samsung devices
content:
eSIM is a brilliant way to simplify cellular plans, but to say it’s underused is certainly an understatement. Today, though, Verizon-owned Visible is announcing support for eSIM on Android, with Google Pixel 6, Pixel 5, and several Samsung phones on the list.

more…

The post Verizon’s Visible expands eSIM support on Android to Google Pixel and Samsung devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Verizon's Visible carrier has added support for eSIM connectivity on Android, starting with Google Pixel and select Samsung phones.
